who-we-are.title: Who we are
who-we-are.description: On a mission to help you launch your business
who-we-are.description-long: We believe that every entrepreneur deserves the tools                              to make their ideas a reality. Our platform provides everything you                              need to create, manage and grow your digital business from day one,                              without technical complications.
who-we-are.description-long-2: We know that starting a business can be overwhelming. That's why we've created an integrated solution that eliminates technical barriers and allows you to focus on what really matters: your vision. From your custom website to customer management, everything is designed to be simple, fast and effective.
who-we-are.description-long-3: Our commitment goes beyond software. We're building a community of brave entrepreneurs who share the dream of creating something own. By choosing Lanzate, you not only get a powerful tool, you join a community designed to help you succeed and grow your business.

about.label: Who we are
about.title: On a mission to help you launch your business

description.paragraph1: Lanzate is an all-in-one web application designed to let you manage your store from anywhere, on any device. From inventory and sales tracking to barcode scanner support, Lanzate gives you all the tools you need to run your business easily and efficiently.
description.paragraph2: Forget about complicated setups — just open your browser to manage products, orders, customers, and billing in real time. Everything stays perfectly synced in the cloud.
description.paragraph3: Our commitment goes beyond software. We're building a community of brave entrepreneurs who share the dream of creating something own. By choosing Lanzate, you not only get a powerful tool, you join a community designed to help you succeed and grow your business.

header.label: Integrations
header.title: All your favorite tools. One single place.
header.description: Connect seamlessly with the platforms and services you already use. Our integrations make it easy to sync your data, manage your workflow, and grow your business without switching between multiple tools.

marquee.title: Trusted by Businesses Worldwide
marquee.description: Founders, developers, and business leaders across the globe chose us for their digital asset operations.

header.label: FAQ
header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.description: Find answers to common questions about Lanzate. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact our support team.

item1.question: What is Lanzate?
item1.answer: Lanzate is a comprehensive all-in-one platform designed to help entrepreneurs and businesses create, manage, and scale their online presence. Our platform combines product management, inventory tracking, social media integration, and sales analytics into a single, powerful solution. Whether you're just starting out or looking to expand your existing business, Lanzate provides the tools you need to manage multiple stores, track your products, engage with customers through social media, and grow your brand—all from one intuitive dashboard.

item2.question: How much does Lanzate cost?
item2.answer: Lanzate offers flexible pricing options to suit businesses of all sizes. Our Starter plan is completely free and perfect for getting started—it includes up to 2 stores and branches, management for up to 500 products, basic analytics, and social media integration. For growing businesses, our Business plan costs $10 per month and expands your capabilities with up to 5 stores and branches, support for up to 2,000 products, custom branding options, and AI-powered features. Our Enterprise plan, priced at $25 per month, is designed for larger operations and includes unlimited stores and branches, unlimited products, advanced inventory management, comprehensive analytics with custom reports, and dedicated support. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.

item3.question: What features are included in Lanzate?
item3.answer: Lanzate provides a complete suite of features to manage your online business efficiently. Our platform includes 100% customizable storefronts, allowing you to create a unique brand experience. You can manage multiple stores and branches from a single dashboard, track inventory in real-time, and organize up to hundreds or thousands of products depending on your plan. We seamlessly integrate with popular social media platforms, enabling you to engage with customers through likes, comments, and direct order management. Additionally, Lanzate offers custom domain support so you can build your brand with your own domain name, comprehensive sales analytics to track performance, and AI-powered features to help optimize your business operations. All features are designed to work together seamlessly for a streamlined experience.

item4.question: Can I use my own domain name with Lanzate?
item4.answer: Yes, absolutely! Lanzate supports custom domain names, allowing you to establish a professional online presence with your own branded domain. This feature enables you to build trust with your customers by using a domain that reflects your brand identity rather than a generic subdomain. Setting up your custom domain is straightforward—simply connect your domain through our dashboard, and we'll guide you through the configuration process. Custom domain support is available on our Business and Enterprise plans, giving you the flexibility to scale your brand as your business grows. This is a key feature for businesses looking to establish a strong, recognizable online presence.

item5.question: How do I get started with Lanzate?
item5.answer: Getting started with Lanzate is quick and easy. Simply sign up for a free account to access our Starter plan—no credit card required. Once you've created your account, you can immediately start setting up your first store, adding products, and configuring your inventory. Our intuitive dashboard will guide you through the initial setup process, and you'll have access to all the core features right away. If you need assistance, our community support is available to help answer questions and guide you through any challenges. As your business grows, you can seamlessly upgrade to a plan that better suits your needs, unlocking additional features like custom domains, advanced analytics, and AI tools. Start building your online business today with Lanzate's free plan!

header.label: Contact
header.title: Contact Us
header.description: Have questions or need help? We're here to assist you. Reach out to our team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

header.label: Pricing

header.title: About us
header.description: Get to know more about us.

description.paragraph1: Lanzate was born out of a very real need that we experienced firsthand. We are Horacio Gutiérrez and Gabriel Ramírez, two programmers who, together with Felipe (our cat and quality supervisor), realized that starting an informal business is not easy. Through experiences with close family and friends who wanted to start their own business, we saw how they struggled with scattered tools, Excel spreadsheets that were lost, and the lack of a simple solution that would allow them to manage everything from a single place.
description.paragraph2: The idea of creating an all-in-one platform for the management of informal stores arose after seeing our loved ones struggling with multiple apps, notebooks, and homemade methods for controlling their sales, inventory, and customers. We realized that there was a huge gap between complex and expensive business solutions and the real needs of someone just starting out. Then we thought: Why not make something that really works for them, is intuitive, accessible, and helps them grow without complicating their lives?
description.paragraph3: So we got to work. With Horacio and Gabriel coding day and night (and Felipe supervising from the keyboard), we developed Lanzate thinking about all those people who have a dream and need the right tools to make it a reality. Our platform integrates everything you need to manage your business: from inventory control to customer tracking, through sales and reports. Because we believe that starting a business shouldn't be complicated, and that with the right tools, anyone can launch.

cookie.title: This site uses cookies
cookie.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience.
